caption.p: Heat-wave days and daily death under 45 heat wave definitions in hot season (May–September) in Wuhan, China during 2003–2010. Table S2. The 46 heat wave definitions (HW01-HW45, and HW CMA) and the sum of Q-BIC values from all group-specific mortality for different heat wave definitions in hot season (May–September) in Wuhan, China during 2003–2010. Figure S1. Sensitive analyses by changing df for day of the year from 4 to 8 (the effect of heat waves on group-specific mortality using definitions of HW14, HW29, HW43, and HW CMA). Figure S2. Sensitive analyses by changing df for relative humidity from 3 to 6 (the effect of heat waves on group-specific mortality using definitions of HW14, HW29, HW43, and HW CMA). (DOCX 877 kb)
